description.text:
Wauw! did you read that!

A forgotten $(b;spring)Castle! Full of Treasures$()!
What? Who cares about the war between the Summer and Winter Court, let them fight it out, while we get all the loot!

Maybe we could ask a Haregon Catographer for help!
They map out the lands, and with their luck they can conjure treasure maps.
If we get our hands on the right one we might be able to $(b;spring)find$() the $(b;winter)End Castle$() 
before the others!

We found it! We are going to find so much treasure!!

I had so much fun with you traveler! Did you have fun with me too? You did! I'm so glad!
 $(b;autumn)I could play with you forever!$()
